text: Jehoas akar isɨn zuir kam gamua, ua kamaghɨn Amasia mɨgei, “Kɨ fo, bar guizbangɨra, nɨ Idomia mɨsogha bar me abɨra. Kamaghɨn amizɨ, nɨ bar akuegha uan ziam bar a fe. Nɨ mɨdorozir kamɨn ziar ekiam ini. Nɨ datɨrɨghɨn bar akuegh, deraghvɨra uan nguibamɨn ikɨ. Egh nɨ ua e mɨsoghsɨ mɨdorozim foran markɨ. Puvatɨghtɨma, nɨ ko Judan gumazamiziba, iregh bar ikuvigham.”
